definition: to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be

sentences.english: I've Just Bitten My Tongue "Are we poisonous?"
sentences.chinese: 我刚咬破自己的舌头“我们有毒吗？”

sentences.english: It is flammable, explosive, toxic and anesthetize nerve centres.
sentences.chinese: 易燃易爆，有毒，能使神经中枢麻醉。

sentences.english: Therefore Pleiadian and Orion tones of creation are poisonous unto earth.
sentences.chinese: 因此昂宿星和猎户座的造物音调对地球是有毒的。

sentences.english: There's rarely a need for toxic paint thinners and brush cleaners.
sentences.chinese: 有很少有有毒刷油漆稀释剂和清洁剂的需求。

sentences.english: If you have pets or children, please note that some plants are toxic.
sentences.chinese: 如果你家里有宠物或者孩子，请注意一些是有毒的。

sentences.english: Lots of spiteful sharks and other venomous beasts breed all over the basin.
sentences.chinese: 大量的恶意鲨鱼和其他有毒的动物品种全流域。

sentences.english: Contact with water liberates toxic, highly flammable gas.
sentences.chinese: 与水接触释放出有毒的，极易燃气体。

sentences.english: That's why the company chooses to produce poisonous cooking oil instead.
sentences.chinese: 这就是这家公司选择生产有毒食用油的原因。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To develop a method for identification and analysis of the unknown toxic herbal medicinal powders: Dysosma pleiantha(Hance) Woodson.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究未知有毒中药粉末六角莲的鉴定与分析方法。

sentences.english: Applies virulent or when the radiochemistry goods pays attention protects oneself .
sentences.chinese: 应用有毒或放射性化学物品时注意保护自己。

sentences.english: Chelating agents can be used to remove toxic metal ions from soil or water.
sentences.chinese: 螯合剂可以用来从土壤或水中清除有毒的金属离子。

sentences.english: Clownfish hide among the poisonous tentacles of a sea anemone without being hurt.
sentences.chinese: 小丑鱼躲茂在海葵有毒的触须中不会受伤。

sentences.english: The toxins can be particularly harmful for people with weakened immune systems.
sentences.chinese: 而这些有毒物质对于免疫系统低下的人可能尤为有害。

sentences.english: The entire plant, also known as a kidney bean tree, is toxic, though some say the flowers are not.
sentences.chinese: 紫藤全株有毒，但也有人说花穗无毒。

sentences.english: Several Chinese dairies are suspected of negligence in allowing the distribution of tainted milk products.
sentences.chinese: 几个中国牛奶场被怀疑在有毒乳制品散布上的有疏漏。

sentences.english: Drink in the center come a cup of yoghurt, with the chroma of attenuant alcohol and toxic substance.
sentences.chinese: 饮酒当中来杯酸奶，以稀释酒精的浓度和有毒物质。

definition: poison gas/toxic gas/manifestation of passion, anger etc (Buddhism)
